body_html: @bughunter99 If you use Keras (2.1.5) and tensorflow-gpu (1.4.1), use the same versions for pc. Make sure your model doesn't have explicit device allocations to gpu. As an alternative, you can also install tensorflow-gpu on the pc.
body_text: @bughunter99 If you use Keras (2.1.5) and tensorflow-gpu (1.4.1), use the same versions for pc. Make sure your model doesn't have explicit device allocations to gpu. As an alternative, you can also install tensorflow-gpu on the pc.
body: @bughunter99 If you use Keras (2.1.5) and tensorflow-gpu (1.4.1), use the same versions for pc. Make sure your model doesn't have explicit device allocations to gpu. As an alternative, you can also install tensorflow-gpu on the pc.
